metadata.description: Open-source AI image generation tool featuring Nano Banana, Flux Kontext, and GPT-4o models. Transform your creative ideas into stunning visuals through natural conversation with advanced AI models.
metadata.keywords: AI image generation, Nano Banana, Flux Kontext, GPT-4o, AI art, image creation, artificial intelligence, creative AI, text to image, AI models

hero.title: Chat Your Way to Amazing Images
hero.subtitle: Powered by Nano Banana, Flux Kontext, and GPT-4o models. Simply describe what you want to see, and watch as Typix transforms your words into stunning AI-generated images.
hero.chatPlaceholder: Describe the image you want to create...

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Focused on AI image generation, turning your ideas into visual art instantly

nanoBanana.name: Nano Banana
nanoBanana.description: Lightweight yet powerful model for quick, high-quality image generation with exceptional creativity.

fluxKontext.name: Flux Kontext
fluxKontext.description: Advanced contextual understanding model that creates images with superior narrative coherence.

gpt4o.name: GPT-4o
gpt4o.description: Multi-modal powerhouse combining text understanding with visual generation capabilities.
